document.full_text: authorities in maine said on tuesday they were investigating a possible military connection to a still-unidentified small boy whose body was found in a remote wooded area over the weekend.
document.title: searchers say maine boy's identity may have military link
lines_and_colors: authorities in maine said on tuesday they were investigating a possible military connection to a still-unidentified small boy whose body was found in a remote wooded area over the weekend.
